remarks.format: ## Remarks 子類別可以使用這個方法，而不是覆寫的屬性值變更時回應提供新函式。Subclasses of the can use this method to respond when the value property changes instead of overriding the to provide a new function. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性回呼和驗證](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-callbacks-and-validation.md)。For more information, see [Dependency Property Callbacks and Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-callbacks-and-validation.md). 方法會引發 事件。The method raises the event. 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.
